newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: South Port sees slightly lower year net.
newsitem.headline: South Port sees slightly lower year net.

text.p: South Port New Zealand Ltd on Friday projected a group tax-paid profit of NZ$3.3 million for the full year ending June 30, 1997.
South Port reported a $3.49 million profit in the previous full year.
The company posted a 2.4 percent rise in half year net earnings to NZ$0.796 million from $0.777 million in the previous comparable period.
It said an operations review reduced permanent staffing with a one-off cost during the period.
